title: Tortelloni with roasted tomato and basil sauce

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ËšC, gas mark 6. Mix together the tomatoes, oil, vinegar, garlic, half the basil and seasoning, place on a baking tray and roast for 15 minutes. Press the tomatoes down slightly with the back of a spoon.
Meanwhile, cook the tortelloni according to pack instructions, drain and return to the pan. Stir in the tomatoes, excess juice and remaining basil.
